title: Montecito Apartments in the best location! Call today for a tour!
posting_body: ['Montecito apartments!', 'In the best location!', 'Enjoy access to a number of amenities that will make living here convenient including 2 laundry rooms as well as 24-hour on-call maintenance.', 'We also provide covered parking, controlled access, and after hour courtesy patrol.', 'Take a swim in either of the two sparkling swimming pools or relax in the spas.', 'Our location places us close to local community colleges, the 14 freeway, and public transportation.', 'Enjoy where you live when you live here at our apartments in Lancaster.', 'Call us or apply online to join us today', 'Our apartment homes feature:', '- Central Air Conditioning & Heating', '- Pest Control', '- Dishwasher', '- Gas stove', '- Patio or Balcony', '-2 pools', '-2 Spas', 'Our Residents enjoy:', '-Garages $200/Month', '-Laundry facilities on site', '-Pest Control', '-Covered Parking(Unassigned)', '-Covered Patios or balconies', '-Full-Sized Washer Dryer Connections (select units)', '-Large trees and lawn areas', '-Centrally Located by the 14 Freeway, Costco, Lancaster City Park, Lancaster Boulevard, & SO MUCH MORE!!!!', 'Dogs and Cats welcome.', '$750.00 security deposit OAC.', 'Under 50lbs at adult age.', 'No Bully Breeds', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
